Title: The Blackout, Part 2: Mock Debate
Writer: Aaron Sorkin (created by), Paul Redford (head writer), Aaron Sorkin, David Handelman (story editor), Ian Reichbach (story editor), Brendan Fehily (staff writer), Cinque Henderson (staff writer), Corinne Kingsbury (staff writer), Amy Rice (staff writer), Gideon Yago (staff writer)
Actors: Jeff Daniels, Emily Mortimer, John Gallagher Jr., Alison Pill
Plot: To get the last rating jump to get the Republican Party Debate, the news team get an exclusive interview with a former friend of Casey Anthony.
